name: Autumn Past
description:
Use the [Arrow Keys] or [WASD] to Move.

Use [Space] to interact with objects and to advance dialogue.

When prompted with a choice use the [Left And Right] or [A and D] keys to scroll between answers and use the [Enter] key to choose an answer.

This is the first game that I've made in such a short amount of time so it is a little bit rough around the edges. But I still like how it turned out and hope you all enjoy it too!
